pli-tv-bu-vb-sk57:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk57:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū chattapāṇissa dhammaṁ desenti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk57:1.3: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk57:1.4: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū chattapāṇissa dhammaṁ desessantī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk57:1.5: “saccaṁ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, chattapāṇissa dhammaṁ desethā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk57:1.8: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, chattapāṇissa dhammaṁ desessatha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk57:1.10: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk57:1.12: Evañcidaṁ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk57:2.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū chattapāṇissa gilānassa dhammaṁ desetuṁ kukkuccāyanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk57:2.3: “kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā chattapāṇissa gilānassa dhammaṁ na desessantī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk57:2.4: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhū tesaṁ manussānaṁ ujjhāyantānaṁ khiyyantānaṁ vipācentānaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk57:2.5: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk57:2.6: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe dhammiṁ kathaṁ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk57:2.8: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk57:2.9.1: “Na chattapāṇissa agilānassa dhammaṁ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk57:2.11: tīṇi chattāni— setacchattaṁ, kilañjacchattaṁ, paṇṇacchattaṁ maṇḍalabaddhaṁ salākabaddhaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk57:2.13: buddhabhāsito sāvakabhāsito isibhāsito devatābhāsito atthūpasañhito dhammūpasañhito.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk57:2.15: padena deseti, pade pade āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk57:2.18: Yo anādariyaṁ paṭicca chattapāṇissa agilānassa dhammaṁ deseti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
